snippet.title: Whisper Mountain Outbreak - Official Update Trailer | The Indie Horror Showcase 2024
snippet.description:
Check out the Official Update Trailer for Whisper Mountain Outbreak, an isometric co-op PvE multiplayer survival horror game developed by Toge Productions. Players will deal with an ancient curse on Mount Bisik by fighting, exploring, and solving puzzles to escape in one piece. Whisper Mountain Outbreak is coming soon to PC with a demo available now.

#WhisperMountainOutbreak #Gaming #Horror
